text: Need Christopher Lee for Mad Mex campaign. Budget around $22,053, looking for 1 x LinkedIn post, 1 x Instagram reel, 2 x 90-second product demo, 1 x Meet and greet. 3 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 2 months. Need to confirm: exclusivity period
